question: can you tell me the blessings for marrying a divorcee with a young son. also what are the blessings for marrying a orphan, widow, blind person etc.
answer:
QUESTION
also what are the belssings for marrying a orphan, widow, blind person etc... what are the rewards for a husband and wife such as a brother told me if i even smile at my wife i would get such and such reward, if i touch her hand i would get such and such amount of reward.
ANSWER


Share:
1. There is abundant reward for marrying someone with a disability. Such an
action would undoubtedly bring great joy to the disabled person. Bringing
joy to another Muslim has been rated as a great form of charity in Islam.
Most of the wives of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) were either
widows or divorcees when they entered into matrimony with him.
2. Every good deed in Islam is rewardable. Smiling at the wife, touching her
or even having intercourse with her is a rewardable act.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
